biotools.summary: Guided modeling of missing segments such as loops or hinge regions into cryo-Electron Microscopy (cryo-EM) density maps [1]. Segments of up to 3-35 residues length can be effectively modeled into maps of different resolution.

bioschemas.name: FragFit
bioschemas.summary: Guided modeling of missing segments such as loops or hinge regions into cryo-Electron Microscopy (cryo-EM) density maps [1]. Segments of up to 3-35 residues length can be effectively modeled into maps of different resolution.
